description: Try our easy to follow Crispy Chicken With Tomato & Thyme Salt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried chicken,High protein,Low salt,Tree nut free,Tomato,Low sugar,Chicken
name: Crispy Chicken With Tomato & Thyme Salt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Combine soup powder with rice flour, thyme leaves, garlic granules and salt in a bowl.

Spray chicken wings with oil. Coat half of them with the tomato mixture and place onto tray. Repeat with remaining chicken. Spray chicken again with oil. Bake for 30 minutes or until crisp and cooked through. Serve with salad leaves and lime wedges.
